Comments_List: This semester we focused on learning more about the Indonesian culture through music. We also got to conduct interviews with native Indonesian speakers which helped me become much more comfortable speaking, as well as better understand life in Indonesia. We even got to attend a lecture on Indonesian theatre.
I liked how this class taught us more about the culture in the country, however it felt a little unorganized at times.
Stengths were that there was a ton of information to be learned and the weakness was that if was a bit unorganized
Yes, Indonesian has been a great and fun language to learn and I am so glad I have continued to take it.
Yes! If you're looking to continue indo this is a great class
